peekOfCode:
def run_shell_bash(c, m):
    m.reply_chat_action(ChatAction.TYPING)
    command = m.text.replace("/bash ", "")
    result = subprocess.run(
        command, stdout=subprocess.PIPE, stderr=subprocess.STDOUT, text=True, shell=True
    )
    m.reply(f"```bash\n{result.stdout}\n```")

def update_server(c, m):

    mp = m.reply("ƒêang c·∫≠p nh·∫≠t h·ªá th·ªëng...")
    os.system("git stash")

    md = m.reply("ƒê√£ c·∫≠p nh·∫≠t xong ƒëang kh·ªüi ƒë·ªông l·∫°i...")
    mp.delete()
    with open("reset.txt", "w") as f:
        f.write(str(m.chat.id) + ":" + str(md.id))
    os.execl(sys.executable, sys.executable, *sys.argv)

def ext_command_list(c, m):
    m.reply_chat_action(ChatAction.TYPING)
    with open("text/ext.md") as f:
        text = f.read()
    text = text.replace("{first_name}", m.from_user.first_name)
    text = text.replace("{uid}", str(m.from_user.id))
    m.reply(text, quote=True)

label: server_info
peekOfCode:
def server_info():
    try:
        response = requests.get("https://ipinfo.io", timeout=30)
        data = response.json()
        ip = data.get("ip", "N/A")
        city = data.get("city", "N/A")
        region = data.get("region", "N/A")
        country = data.get("country", "N/A")
        provider = data.get("org", "N/A")
        ip_info = f"IP: {ip}\nCity: {city}\nRegion: {region}\nCountry: {country}\nProvider: {provider}"

label: bot_server_info
peekOfCode:
def bot_server_info(c, m):
    ver = platform.version()
    name = platform.uname()
    system = platform.system()
    server = server_info()
    msg_text = (
        f"```{system}\n" f"INFO:\n{name}\n\n" f"VERSION:\n{ver}\n\n" f"{server}\n" "```"
    )
    m.reply(msg_text, quote=True)

def set_proxy(c, m):
    proxy = m.command[1]
    os.system("killall -9 lite")

    stt = m.reply("ƒê√£ thi·∫øt l·∫≠p proxy")
    m.delete()
    time.sleep(10)
    stt.delete()

label: run_cmd
peekOfCode:
def run_cmd(hostname: str, username: str, password: str, ssh_port: int, cmd: str):
    try:
        ssh = paramiko.SSHClient()
        ssh.set_missing_host_key_policy(paramiko.AutoAddPolicy())
        ssh.connect(hostname, ssh_port, username, password)
        stdin, stdout, stderr = ssh.exec_command(cmd)
        output = stdout.read().decode("utf-8")
        errors = stderr.read().decode("utf-8")
        exit_status = stdout.channel.recv_exit_status()
        ssh.close()
